title: Client ribbon.banner format
body:
I like the format of the new ribbon/banner on the top of the client. My only issue is the IP and RP values are hard to see when specific pictures are put into the picture rotation. The imgur link shows a specific picture that caused, at least me, to have a hard time seeing those values.  I like and understand the idea of having the picture throughout the entire client screen. It looks very seamless. However, when you create something like that, having icons or some form of data (IP and RP values) within that, you have to take being able to see them to mind.

Possible Solutions:
Outline the white font with black or vice versa
Don't have the IP and RP values in the client ribbon
Create a different background for those areas
Don't have a seamless picture throughout the top portion of the client

Just my thoughts. What does everyone think?

link here also:[](http://imgur.com/RNpicwf)

replies.body: We already did some adjustments related to this,  check them out with the next patch.
